types.description: Whisky or whiskey is a type of distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash. Various grains (which may be malted) are used for different varieties, including barley, corn, rye, and wheat. Whisky is typically aged in wooden casks, generally made of charred white oak.

subtypes.description: Scotch whisky is malt whisky or grain whisky made in Scotland. Scotch whisky must be made in a manner specified by law. All Scotch whisky was originally made from malted barley. Commercial distilleries began introducing whisky made from wheat and rye in the late 18th century.

products.name: Buchanans Pineapple
products.description: Buchanan's Pineapple is a blend of Scotland's finest single malt whiskies. It is a whisky of uncommon depth and balance, with a smooth, rich flavor.

products.name: Buchanans 12 Years
products.description: Buchanan's 12-year-old Scotch whisky is a blend of Scotland's finest single malt whiskies. It is one of the most iconic and awarded Scotch whisky brands in the world. It has a soft and fruity flavor, with orange and chocolate notes that allow it to be served on the rocks or neat.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Red Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Red Label is the world's best-selling Scotch Whisky. It's renowned for its bold, characterful taste – balanced to shine through even when mixed. It's a flavor the Walker family has never compromised on.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Black Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Black Label is a true icon, recognized as the benchmark for all other deluxe blends. Created using only whiskies aged for a minimum of 12 years from the four corners of Scotland, Johnnie Walker Black Label has an unmistakably smooth, deep, complex character.

products.name: Johnnie Walker High Rye
products.description: Johnnie Walker High Rye is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Double Black
products.description: Johnnie Walker Double Black is inspired by the iconic flavors of Johnnie Walker Black Label and turns them up to create a blend of unprecedented intensity. Strongly influenced by powerful West Coast and Island whiskies – it's an impressive choice and ideal for exploring deeper, more intense flavors.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Swing
products.description: Johnnie Walker Swing is a luxurious and smooth whisky with a variety of tastes and textures. It is a blend of up to 35 of the finest aged single malts and grain whiskies. It is a blend of up to 35 of the finest aged single malts and grain whiskies.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Green Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Green Label is back, and this time it's here to stay. Crafted from a palette of Speyside, Highland, Lowland, and Island malts and matured for at least 15 years, it delivers all the character of a single malt whisky, but with a greater depth of flavor.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Gold Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve is known for its creamy smoothness. It opens with a luxurious burst of delicate nectar and gentle smokiness that develops into sweet fruits and deeper, velvety, honeyed tones before giving way to sublime, lingering whispers of smoke and oakiness in the finish.

products.name: Johnnie Walker 18 Year
products.description: Johnnie Walker 18 Year Old is a mellow, complex Scotch. It marries up to 18 different whiskies, each chosen for their remarkable depth of flavor and character. The result is a deep, rich, and complex balance of flavors.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Blue Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Blue Label is an unrivaled masterpiece. It is an exquisite blend made from some of Scotland's rarest and most exceptional Scotch whiskies. subtypes.description: Bourbon whiskey is a type of American whiskey, a barrel-aged distilled spirit made primarily from corn. The name ultimately derives from the French Bourbon dynasty, although the precise inspiration for the whiskey's name is uncertain; contenders include Bourbon County in Kentucky and Bourbon Street in New Orleans, both of which are named after the dynasty.

products.name: Jack Daniels Black
products.description: Jack Daniel's Black Label offers gentle aromas of caramel, vanilla, and butterscotch. A hint of wood is apparent and toffee notes begin to appear in the glass as it opens up. The palate is smooth with flavors of caramel, vanilla, and a hint of chocolate. The finish is long and lingering with a hint of spice.

products.name: Jack Daniels Honey
products.description: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Honey is a blend of Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey and a unique honey liqueur of our own making, for a taste that's one-of-a-kind and unmistakably Jack. With hints of honey and a finish that's naturally smooth, Jack Daniel's Tennessee Honey offers a taste of the unexpected.

products.name: Jack Daniels Fire
products.description: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Fire delivers a rich, complex and multi-dimensional tasting experience. Jack Daniel's Tennessee Fire is crafted with Jack Daniel's Old No. 7 Tennessee Whiskey and naturally infused with a proprietary red hot cinnamon liqueur. The result is a sweet, hot cinnamon kick that complements the smooth and delicious taste of Jack Daniel's, giving you a unique finish full of unmistakable character.

products.name: Jack Daniels Apple
products.description: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Apple has the unique character of Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey, the crisp taste of green apple and a rewarding finish; it's been described by our master distiller as being 'like freshly picked apple in a glass of Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey'.

products.name: Jack Daniels Triple Mash
products.description: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Triple Mash is a limited edition, higher proof release from the Jack Daniel Distillery. This whiskey is made using the same mash bill as Jack Daniel's Old No. 7, but is triple distilled, giving it a higher proof and a slightly different flavor profile.

products.name: Jack Daniels Bonded
products.description: Jack Daniel's Bottled in Bond is a special release from the Jack Daniel Distillery. This whiskey is made using the same mash bill as Jack Daniel's Old No. 7, but is bottled at 100 proof and aged for at least four years.

products.name: Jack Daniels Single Barrel Rye
products.description: Jack Daniel's Single Barrel Rye is a limited release from the Jack Daniel Distillery. This whiskey is made using a mash bill of 70% rye, 18% corn, and 12% malted barley, and is aged in new, charred oak barrels.

products.name: Jack Daniels Single Barrel Select
products.description: Jack Daniel's Single Barrel Select is a special release from the Jack Daniel Distillery. This whiskey is made using the same mash bill as Jack Daniel's Old No. 7, but is aged in new, charred oak barrels and bottled at a higher proof.

subtypes.description: Irish whiskey is whiskey made on the island of Ireland. The word 'whiskey' is an Anglicisation of the first word in the Gaelic phrase, uisce beatha, meaning 'water of life'.

products.name: Jameson
products.description: Jameson is a blended Irish whiskey produced by the Irish Distillers subsidiary of Pernod Ricard. The John Jameson and Son Irish Whiskey company was formally established in 1810 when John Jameson and his son (also John Jameson) took ownership of the Bow Street Distillery in Dublin which had originally been built by his wife's cousins the Steins in 1780.

products.name: Jameson Black Barrel
products.description: Jameson Black Barrel is a tribute to the cooper's method of charring barrels. Charring is an age-old method for invigorating barrels to intensify the taste. Jameson Black Barrel is our tribute to our coopers, who painstakingly give their bourbon barrels an additional charring to reveal their untold richness and complexity.

products.name: Patron Blanco
products.description: Patrón Tequila Blanco is a crystal clear, pure ultra premium tequila. This light. fresh tequila is a favorite of tequila connoisseurs worldwide. Many prefer this smooth, soft and light tequila over an aged and slightly oaky flavor. Patron Tequila is a favorite of many celebrities.

products.name: Patron Reposado
products.description: Patrón Reposado is a nice switch for current tequila drinkers who want a bit more complexity and smoothness of taste. Aged in oak barrels for over two months, it blends the fresh, clean taste of Patrón Silver with the oaky flavor of Patrón Añejo. The balance of fresh agave and oak wood with subtle fruit, citrus and honey notes makes it an excellent sipping tequila or for a premium cocktail.

products.name: Patron Anejo
products.description: Patrón Añejo is a delicate blend of uniquely aged tequilas, all aged in small white oak barrels for a minimum of 12 months. Similar to winemaking, each vintage of Patrón Añejo is carefully blended to produce a smooth and sweet tasting tequila. It's distinct oakwood flavor complemented by vanilla, raisins, and honey with a caramel and smoky finish makes it perfect for sipping.

products.name: Patron XO Cafe
products.description: Patrón XO Cafe is an extraordinary blend of ultra premium tequila and the natural essences of the finest coffee. Unlike most coffee liqueurs, the taste is more dry than sweet. The higher proof brings out the flavor of the pure coffee essence and the ultra premium tequila. It is excellent for sipping as well as a premium ingredient in a cocktail.

products.name: Gran Patron Platinum

types.description: Vodka is a distilled beverage composed primarily of water and ethanol, sometimes with traces of impurities and flavorings. products.description: Budweiser is brewed using a blend of premium aroma hop varieties, both American-grown and imported, and a combination of barley malts and rice.
